column5: This is our home when we visit our grandchildren--it has been recently remodeled and stocked with top-of-the-line mattresses, sheets, towels, etc. Fully stocked kitchen. As former Texans, we picked this location for the convenience. We are about 1/2 mile from ATT (Cowboys) Stadium, Globe Life (Rangers) Stadium, Arlington Convention Center, and about a mile from Six Flags & Hurricane Harbor; 20 minutes to both Dallas and Ft Worth, and within walking distance of shopping and restaurants.
column8: Updated, Comfy Home in Entertainment District
